title: @Riot please, I am 10 rp off of getting that dabbing penguin emote. dear god please can I get 10 rp?
body: Please for the love of all that is holy can you please give me that penguin emote. this is not a joke look at my balance. I want that penguin more than i want to breath.

replies.body:
YOOOOO dat pengu is the best. Hit me back with a quick sketch of him dabbing on your foes and I'll make that happen for ya
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

FeelsBadMan, WHAT DO YOU MEAN CY@
{{item:3070}}
